website_summaries.verdict: One of Sunday Riley's most popular serums that improves the look and texture of your skin.
pros: Features lactic acid to exfoliate and reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and pores
Licorice and lemongrass help brighten dark spots, and prickly pear extract soothes skin
Can help improve acne scars as well
cons: This is a strong serum, and some might need to dilute it or work up to using every night

customer_reviews.title: Smell?
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, although pretty pricey. I have one concern about buying it on Amazon vs. Sephora or a Department store. In Sephora and Dept, store it has an unpleasant smell, and the one I purchased on Amazon smells ok and citrus- like. I’m wondering why 2 very different scents on the same product; I am hoping Amazons wasn’t a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Stumbled across this at Sephora- Life Changing!
customer_reviews.text: OMG- this cream is A-Mazing!!! You see results instantly! I don’t know how, but I was not expecting to find such an amazing product! I purchased the small kit about 2 weeks ago, and have already purchased the $100 size of the Good Genes, as I couldn’t resist. I normally don’t like to spend so much on skin products, as I usually find very good natural products at reasonable prices. But this product instantly made my skin look bright and healthy. My pimples went away immediately and my blemish scaring disappearing daily. I’m not sure if that’s supposed to be one of the benefits, however, I haven’t seen my skin bounce back to normal so fast in many years!
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Review from professional
customer_reviews.text: Been a makeup artist for 15 years... I’m obsessed with this particular product because of it’s immediate results. It plumps the skin and gives it LIFE. Smells incredible too - lemongrass would be the predominant note. TIP: try it with Ceramic Slip Face Wash, a Foreo Luna brush, and some Thayers Toner between wash and Good Genes.
customer_reviews.author: vittorio

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I purchased last time. Different smell and texture. Will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: MASSIVE BREAKOUTS EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: Sensitive skin but I always managed, it wasn’t until I used this on my face (slow build over 2 months) is now completely broken out everywhere. It took the last month when Id also apply to my neck to notice this gave me the a massive break out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Good Genes, Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best product serum I have used on my face. It is insane how different, HOW HEALTHY, my skin looks. I use Good Genes in combination with Luna Oil, and my skin has never look more even toned, more exfoliated, and more fresh. It's also helped a bit with my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Coclico: The Good, the Bad, the Ugly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best skin care product EVER! my skin looks amazing and younger when I use this.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Bake

customer_reviews.title: not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: smelled nothing like the product I buy at Sephora .. returned
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Test a small skin patch before committing!
customer_reviews.text: I never wore reviews, but this product was so bad I had to. I have been using Mario Badescu buttermilk moisturizer for ever, so I thought I'd switch it up and add this into my routine. The breakout that it caused was so bad, it spread all over my body. I had to take antibiotics for 30 days and it's still not gone. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sardesons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My skin improved in a week. Only downside is the small amount that comes per bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s just not my product
customer_reviews.text: I used this about two weeks and I stop using this . I have dry sensitive skin and this might be irritate for my skin because it made my skin has pimples just after two nights after I used it . I would suggest getting sample first before you use it .
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I have never taken the time to write a review of any product, but I felt this one was necessary. The picture on the left was taken at 5:00pm this evening, and the picture on the right was taken at midnight. I am not wearing makeup in either. This product is truly unbelievable. I am floored by the difference it has made in a matter of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Burning and stinging my skin. Tried it over a ...
customer_reviews.text: Burning and stinging my skin. Tried it over a couple of month and my skin never got used to it. It created bumps and redness
customer_reviews.author: Rona

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell but the product did nothing, been using it for weeks and notice no changes. It does work good as a moisturizer so I continue to use it because I spent a lot of money on it! Wouldn’t recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend. And I’ve been using it now for over a year and I recommend it to other people and they all say what a great product it is. I worked in the cosmetic business for over 25 years. And hands-down this is just a great product for your skin. Do yourself a favor and buy one. I’ll never go without this.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty finds

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Certain things I need in my life and this is one of them. Makes my skin flawless. I absolutely love it! I wear as a moisturizer under my makeup. Scent is pleasant. Soaks right in. I hate the price but again, a must have guilty lil pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Very watery compared to other Sunday Riley I’ve purchased
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased many bottles of Sunday Riley before, this one was much more watery than any other I’ve ever had. It seems either expired with a broken down consistently or watered down. I can’t figure out which it is.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money,
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same, does nothing like the other one.... refund me please... garbage
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This is 💯 FAKE. The packaging may have you think otherwise, but the product is either diluted or altogether something else. My suspicions were raised after not feeling the typical mild burn that good genes gives my skin (lactic acid). Additionally the product itself is thicker than the one from Ulta or Sephora and doesn’t smell the same. Who knows what this is, DO NOT BUY off Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Szeglin

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks better and the smell isn't as bad as other people ...
customer_reviews.text: My skin looks better and the smell isn't as bad as other people have reported. Doesn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Issaquah WA

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great moisturizer for mature skin. Gives a really nice glow to the skin. The only drawback is its too pricey for the amount you receive! Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: patty leone

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this ! I am 53 and take very good care of my skin so I am always looking for good products I noticed within a day very fine lines diminished It makes my skin very soft and my girlfriend who is an esthetician even asked me what I was using It smells great and is lightweight. I use it only at night under my normal moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Mtggirl34

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great daily serum! Noticeably reduced age spots within 2 weeks of use. Skin looks refreshed and less visible wrinkles. Smells great and feels good putting it on. A favorite of mine!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Cadigan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product along with the other Sunday Riley products for brightening. Together with the other products this product has brightened my skin tone and now it’s more even in tone.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but so worth it
customer_reviews.text: This product is eye-wateringly expensive, but every time I purchase it I am blown away by how good it is. I have very sensitive, acne-prone skin with scarring and cannot use normal AHA products. I have tried everything, and nothing has ever worked like this. This product is incredible. Within a few days of use, pimples have disappeared and scars are already fading. My pores are smaller, and my skin has a dewy glow. I recommend that anyone suffering from hormonal acne and scarring give this product a go. It's expensive but it's an excellent reset for screwed up skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kpann

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a while and I should be seeing results. It feels like it's doing something when I put it on, but I don't see any difference, to be honest. It came highly recommended by a friend with similar skin, but I guess it's not my product.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell, how awesome it makes my skin feel. It's crazy expensive, but totally worth it. The first time I used it was a free sample in one of my Beauty boxes. I literally cut the tube open so I could use every last drop. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Connie R Ames

customer_reviews.title: Nice skin product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I got it as a sample at first and I used it for a couple of weeks. It seems to make me look less blotchy and even skin toned. I liked it enough to buy the product. It’s cheaper on line than in Sephora. I’m half done with my bottle and will likely buy it again :-)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Is this a magic potion? Very likely
customer_reviews.text: Like many others I was hesitant to order this product due to the price. However, I was won over by all the rave reviews I’ve seen across multiple sites. Within two days my skin looked smoother, brighter and my old acne spots/blackheads are disappearing. (Full disclosure I’m also using Glossier’s Solution which also aids in chemical exfoliation/skin turnover)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Effective & Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Works great, better than any other product I’ve tried at reducing dark sun blotches. It’s expensive, though, and there is controversy over the small amount in the bottle. That said, I’ll probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Doss

customer_reviews.title: Arrived previously opened and leaking
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in the Sunday Riley box, but it had been previously opened. The top wasn’t closed all the way and 1/4 of the product leaked out in the box. Very disappointing at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: ChandraSJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy from website don’t think this is legit
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is the real thing or it’s a watered dawn version bc my skin broke out when i used this but I’d had it before with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Worth adding
customer_reviews.text: I use UFO and Luna, but felt a want to sharpen up my routine just a bit. I get dry skin, can’t use daily. I can tell a small positive difference in adding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It smells wonderful is light and my skin looks and feels so much healthier; younger. Normally I break out with any new product but not this one just great results which is a refreshing change. So glad someone recommended it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Air

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say that this very expensive product made any difference on my face. I was very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mtn

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but great.
customer_reviews.text: Impressive stuff. Really makes a difference. 4 stars because it's too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Decemberlarry

customer_reviews.title: It made my face puffy
customer_reviews.text: This product made my face swell up slightly in a rash, my whole face was puffy. I used it for a week and then stopped. It went away in about a day or two after I stopped using. I wasn't impressed with Sunday Riley Good Genes for the price I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonelle Lytton

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My second bottle. It has improved the look and feel of my skin. I use it nightly. My Skin looks Wow!! Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, glad I was able to snag it cheaper than usual
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice goes on smooth. Feel Like my Skin is maybe a little brighter after a few weeks use?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best, best, best product for your skin....could not live without it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah a. kaplan

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best thing Ive put on my face. Ive been using for 4 days and I can already tell a huge difference in pore size and smoothness. The whole Sunday Riley line is amazing, but this product in my opinion is the best for quick results in multiple areas.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: Dry like nivea, no good
customer_reviews.text: This actually works!ve bought this many times and loved it but this is dry and nothing like the other ones ive gotten. I’ve heard there are are fake ones and this is probably one of them.
customer_reviews.author: cindy d.

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes and minimizes pores well.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It moisturizes my face while minimizing my pores. It is a bit pricey, but it is to be expected from a high and facial care product.
customer_reviews.author: Tatjana

customer_reviews.title: In love with this product
customer_reviews.text: In love with this product! Noticed a big difference in the tone and texture of my skin! Helps blemishes as well! It has a little oder when you apply it but it goes away very fast! It's a great product so far! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what other customers were complaining about having a different scent than the ones sold in Sephora. All I know is that I didn't have to make a trip to the mall to get it. I love this product and it does not irritate my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: jessica cifaldi

customer_reviews.title: The bottle was almost empty
customer_reviews.text: Wow. It got to me more than half empty. How amazingly disappointing. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: love putting this on top of the sunday riley oil
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is really no better than any other AHA exfoliating product
customer_reviews.text: This is really no better than any other AHA exfoliating product. Results are similar to another product I purchased after this which was roughly 1/8 the cost per ounce. Save an exorbitant amount of money and choose another, cheaper AHA.
customer_reviews.author: Alli M.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Evens skin tone and feels great. I wouldn’t use it as a moisturizer though.
customer_reviews.author: Lizrippe

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Changed my skin dramatically. More than any other products I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Jmm625

customer_reviews.title: Non-greasy Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the light texture of it. I haven't used it long enough to give a further opinion on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer CAS

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT! Wow - 30-something feeling pretty :)
customer_reviews.text: 1st product review ever maybe?? Only because this is the only product I've paid $$$'s on the past few-years that ACTUALLY (and quickly) provided results. My skin looks healthier than it has in years - worth the spend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, Love this Cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream. It's a miracle for my skin. Everything can't be for everybody, but I'm glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: pwte

customer_reviews.title: Good Genes is good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I literally scraped the bottle until it was completely empty. Good Genes makes my skin look great!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product. I've gotten many compliments about my skin since using it.
customer_reviews.author: Malesha Cosay

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but great
customer_reviews.text: I just love waking up to great skin after I use this at night! I don’t want to run out of it but I’ll have to find a dupe because it’s too expensive to repurchase over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: NadyM

customer_reviews.title: The Best anti aging  product.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to improve my sagging skin and it really worked, I’d recommend it for every women who is facing aging effects, this stuff is really awesome..,
customer_reviews.author: zehra ghory

customer_reviews.title: Bottle not full?
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, and I would've given it a 5-star rating.. but I was a little dissapointed to see that the fill of the bottle was only about 2/3 full; at this price, I'm not sure if I'd repurchace for so few uses. I'm not sure if it's supposed to be like this, so I'll have to check if the fill is any better at Sephora (seeing the price is the same).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mine was likely a knockoff.
customer_reviews.text: Not CERTAIN, but I suspect I was shipped a knockoff. Purchased a replacement from another location and the scent and consistency is different, and it feels different on my skin. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: poppy12

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The scent is nice and I have seen results after just 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant smelling and light feeling on the skin. Leaves skin noticeably smoother the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G. James

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I heard so much good but when i opened and used it burned so much and it smelled so bad like it wasn’t good
customer_reviews.author: Budoor

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable reduction in pores and Increased smoothness of skin. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well on skin-  scent is okay...
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! I think it smells alright, but my kids however, don’t 😊
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Best facial product I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: My skin feels so smooth, and smells wonderful. It is like a treat for my face every night when I put it on!
customer_reviews.author: Sherie Weber

customer_reviews.title: it looked like burn marks on the skin
customer_reviews.text: Skin got spoiled. After a week's use, it looked like burn marks on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Results
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I have added to my ever changing regime. This is a keeper for life.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Very different
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why but when my wife used just one bottle, the skin became quite clearer and lively.
customer_reviews.author: POCHENDAR SHENIGARAPU

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bright skin
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders. A must have for blemishes. Tingles a bit but bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene coleman

customer_reviews.title: Really works.
customer_reviews.text: 1 month of use and my skin is so much brighter and softer!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Carberry

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it’s worth every cent smells great and leaves the skin silky but not greasy
customer_reviews.author: Pam J. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like product because it does not make my face oily
customer_reviews.author: Paul Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lactic Acid is a great skin rejuvenator
customer_reviews.text: I already know and use the product, it does what it says it does. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L. J. McGillicuddy

customer_reviews.title: Life changing - a real keeper
customer_reviews.text: Has made a real difference! Will continue to use !
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: The results are here! Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I love that product! If you're looking for real results look no further ! I have less pigmentation on my skin, and less wrinkles! The results are pretty dramatic . This is my second order .
customer_reviews.author: Julia D. Darmon

customer_reviews.title: Love this! From fine lines
customer_reviews.text: Love this! From fine lines, acne, anything I put it on my face at night and the next morning I can actually tell a difference. It does dry out my skin a bit and sometimes make it blotchy so I put it on lightly with time to sit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too expensive for what it is!
customer_reviews.text: Look, this one is good, but it is just not worth the price tag that is why i give it 3 stars. It doesnt do miracles to your skin. It s good yes, but if you have any sensitivity to money spent - doesnt match up.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this produce and cannot recommend it enough. Its worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: zakit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best investment for you skin!! now my holy grail for sure
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It smells good, it feels great on my skin, and I see results!
customer_reviews.author: B.K. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Good Genes Great Results!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. It delivers the results it touts!
customer_reviews.author: Hmw4477

customer_reviews.title: Alright I guess
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say what, if anything, this did for my skin. It didn't do any harm, but I don't know that it did any good. It's more expensive than I usually buy. I tend to stick to skin care in the 20-30 range. It did last me over a year using half a pump in the evening only. I would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Would be kind of funny since I first wanted to try the product because ...
customer_reviews.text: I've reviewed this item before and rave about it every time. This is probably my all time fave skin product, my ride or die. I almost think I should get in touch with Sunday Riley and ask for PR status! Would be kind of funny since I first wanted to try the product because we share the same name, but then I fell in love with the serum and the results. Give it a try, your skin will thank you - every day, twice on Sunday ;)
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third bottle and love this product. After my second bottle, I could really see the difference and started getting compliments on my skin which now feels tighter, firmer, and more even in texture. I also feel like I don't need to use as much make up because my skin looks great.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the hype. As usual, I bought in,..as usual, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: michelle farina

customer_reviews.title: Sunday Riley -- excellent
customer_reviews.text: Been using Good Genes for awhile and think it does a fabulous job. People ask me about my skin all the time.
customer_reviews.author: leslie byers

customer_reviews.title: This will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to invest in plastic surgeon in your older years....use this....amazing I use it twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Diva Shopper

customer_reviews.title: a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly amazing! My oily skin feels balanced and much smoother after just a few uses. It's expensive but there are much more expensive products out there that don't work half as well. Not to mention you will never have to waste $$ on a bunch of products that when used all together don't work as well. Good Genes is a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: kelsy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This corrective treatment is fabulous my skin looks 10 years younger, dark spots are fading I have a glow!!! Bought I 1Fl ounce 2 months ago bought second this week, as far as pricey I'll invest $110 on my well being then on other non factors ie: cigs,getting drunk! Invest in yourself for the duration.
customer_reviews.author: jackie rudd

customer_reviews.title: I can FEEL it working!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this outrageously expensive product for about 3 years. Use it sparingly and not as frequently as I would if money was no object. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Happy One

customer_reviews.title: Ok but you can find other alternatives
customer_reviews.text: First sample used a few months ago really made a brightening difference; maybe formula changed - doesn't work like that original sample. Or maybe it worked so well there is no more brightening to do! Would not buy again but would use a free sample.
customer_reviews.author: YQM28

customer_reviews.title: Good, but unsure.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really had much experience with this by itself, but mixing it with the Sunday Riley oils is great, it really takes away some of the oily feeling after application.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: however I was pleasantly surprised how great it made my skin and no reaction
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and has reservations about introducing new products. however I was pleasantly surprised how great it made my skin and no reaction. I have noticed better skin. everyone has commented how great my skin looks. this is now part of my daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: M. Khan

customer_reviews.title: I am 3/4 through the bottle and am pretty disappointed. So many people claim to have instant ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 3/4 through the bottle and am pretty disappointed. So many people claim to have instant results with this, but I truly have not seen any difference. It seems really nice, like lemon custard, and it stings a little when I put it on, which seems like it might be doing something, but really, there is no way for me to justify this kind of splurge again. I wanted to like it, I wanted to believe the hype, but it just has done nothing for me.
customer_reviews.author: CaityB

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing treatment ever. I'm not one to spend $100 on a serum, but I'd do it again. This stuff is gold. I've used plenty of other products with medial results. This stuff is amazing. I noticed a difference after one day! My skin is glowing. Much for even and "dewy"/shiny. My husband even noticed ( and he still doesn't notice my hair when I change it!). I highly recommend this to all. It tingles a bit for the first 10 min or so, but that's how I know it's working! It was a little uncomfortable the first time two, but now I don't even notice it. I'll buy this again Ann'ands again
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I can't really afford it all the time but it's great for "Treat Yo Self!" times
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L

customer_reviews.title: Delivers 100%
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be underwhelmed by this product because of the price, but that is definitely not the case. After two nights of applying less then one pump to my skin it has evened out and I barely need to wear any makeup. I have never used such an effective product, I highly recommend! PS I am have very fair and sensitive skin and I have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Its has a bad smell. I threw it
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and found this product harsh. It made me break-out something that rarely happens. Its has a bad smell. I threw it out
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Authentic as far as I can tell. I've been using good genes for awhile now and took the chance using an Amazon gift card I received. Looks/smells/feels identical in all ways to my good genes purchased at Sephora. Great product, if a bit pricey. I've tried a lot of lactic acid peels and this one is gentle enough to use every day, even with retinoids as part of my skincare, but still very effective and I find this one to be the best for my skin even if it isnt the best for my wallet lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

product_meta.title: Sunday Riley Good Genes All-in-One Lactic Acid Treatment, 1.0 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Good Genes All-In-One Lactic Acid Treatment . Ingredients - High Potency, Purified Grade Lactic Acid: Exfoliates dull, pore-clogging dead skin cells to instantly clarify and reveal smoother, clearer, younger-looking skin, while fighting visible signs of hyperpigmentation. -Licorice (Glycyrrhiza Glabra): Naturally brightens the appearance of hyperpigmentation. -Lemongrass: Helps boost radiance. -Aloe: Helps soothe the skin. Opuntia Tuna Fruit (Prickly Pear) Extract, Agave Tequilana Leaf (Blue Agave) Extract, Cypripedium Pubescens (Lady's Slipper Orchid) Extract, Opuntia Vulgaris (Cactus) Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract & Saccharomyses Cerevisiae (Yeast) Extract, Lactic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Squalane, Cyclomethicone, Dimethicone, Ppg-12/Smdi Copolymer, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol And Ceteareth20, Glyceryl Stearate And Peg-100 Stearate, Arnica Montana (Flower) Extract, Peg-75 Meadowfoam Oil, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus (Lemongrass) Oil, Triethanolamine, Xantham Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-20, Dmdm Hydantoin.

HOW IT WORKS:
Multi-tasking, targeted lactic acid treatment rapidly exfoliates and boosts naturally youthful radiance, while visibly reducing the look of lines, wrinkles and dark spots. High potency, purified grade lactic acid exfoliates dull, pore-clogging dead skin cells, to instantly clarify and reveal smoother, clearer skin. Together with skin brightening licorice, this super-concentrated treatment visually reduces the look of dark spots, age spots, and discoloration caused by exposure to the sun, for naturally brighter, even-toned skin.

Clinically proven to immediately and significantly plump fine lines and boost radiance in just 3 minutes.

BRAND STORY
Sunday Riley uses only cutting-edge technology and the highest quality ingredients, for instant, noticeable results, without compromise. Welcome to the world of Sunday Riley – clean formulas, for results you can feel good about.
